Texts.Chs: 这是一个猫抓板？看起来我可以将其用作传送的座标点
Texts.Eng: A scratching post? Looks I can use this as a waypoint for teleportation.

Texts.Chs: 上有一个定位模块，可以标记为传送点
Texts.Eng: A small locator module attached to this scratching post allows it to be bookmarked for teleportation.

Texts.Chs: 猫觉得飘扬的旗帜有点太诱人了，所以它们用抓痕作为标记
Texts.Eng: Cats find the waving flag to be a little TOO enticing, so they tend to use scratching posts as markers instead.

Texts.Chs: 我可以将猫抓板标记为快速传送
Texts.Eng: I can bookmark this scratching post for quick teleportin'.

Texts.Chs: 猫抓板可以传回-传送器
Texts.Eng: Ssscratching posst makess good point to teleport back to ussing teleporter!

Texts.Chs: 这个猫抓板可以作为一个路径点，让我可以用传送器回到这一点。
Texts.Eng: This scratching post can act as a way point, enabling me to return to this point using a teleporter.

Texts.Chs: 这个猫抓板可以保存为我传送的位置。我可以随时回来。
Texts.Eng: This scratching post can be saved as a location for my teleporter. Then I can return to it at any time.

Texts.Chs: 这是猫磨指甲的地方，可以用作传送点
Texts.Eng: This scratching post can serve as a place to sharpen nails, and it allows mew to bookmark it for teleportation!

Texts.Chs: 这个猫抓板意味着周围必定有猫。看起来它可以被标记为我的飞船传送器的目的地
Texts.Eng: This scratching post must mean there are cats about. Looks like it can be bookmarked as a destination for my ship teleporter.
